title: 079: Slowpoke
description:
Slowpoke is AWESOME-ly slow to react to anything. Perhaps the most patient fisherman we will see naught but from Slowpoke we will see hunger a lot. By the time Slowpoke realizes he is hungry he may have become a Slowbro!

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/synspawn)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Slowpoke)
long_description:
Slowpoke is AWESOME-ly slow to react to anything. Perhaps the most patient fisherman we will see naught but from Slowpoke we will see hunger a lot. By the time Slowpoke realizes he is hungry he may have become a Slowbro!

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/synspawn)
